hero.intro: Java Developer. I am looking to focus primarily on backend development using technologies such as Java, Spring Framework / Spring Boot, MySQL, and Git, among others related to software development.

aboutMe.intro: My name is Alejandro Dami√°n Dip, I am from Argentina. I specialize in backend web development using primarily Java ecosystem technologies such as:
aboutMe.tools: Tools like Git and databases like MySQL. I also have some experience with frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
aboutMe.bestPractices: Always striving to follow good development practices and apply principles such as SOLID, DRY, and design patterns like MVC.

projects.description: Informative website for a Chinese martial arts school. The purpose of this project was to provide a way to showcase the school's history and philosophy, as well as visual content (images and videos) that display the activities the institution offers and performs. It also presents means to communicate and obtain information about classes. All this presented in a simple manner for interested users.

Website providing information about the exchange rate in Argentine pesos ($ARS) for the main types of dollars available in Argentina. This is achieved by consuming information provided by an API and displaying it in an HTML view.

Web application that allows for the registration, modification, and deletion of products and suppliers in a database. It also allows for importing information from .csv and .xlsx files, and exporting information to PDF and Excel documents.

API that provides CRUD operations to facilitate the management of information about students, teachers, and dojos of a Chinese martial arts school. In addition, a web client interacts with the API in a user-friendly way, allowing users to register and access the system to consult, add, modify, and delete information based on their user role.
